interests.description: Operating since 1914 and considered one of the wonders of the world, this fifty-mile waterway transports ships by raising them from sea level to more than 85 feet via a series of gravity-powered locks.
interests.review: I'm obsessed with shipping containers, so this place was a MUST SEE for me. There were definitely A LOT of shipping containers. I wonder if any of them contained something I'm going to purchase from Amazon in the future... How exciting!!! A++++
